summary: Small fix of the tavern Clothes for those with UNP DIMONIZED Body
descriptionHtml:
For those of you out there who downloaded the bikini version of UNP for a reason and noticed this. Here is a small fix I did. I\'m only posting this up if anyone else wants it. I\'m not the best texturing, but here this is. I\'m not very good at the \"bump mapping\" stuff, but I will mess around with it to fix it.

Cause of this exposure:
The Improved NPC clothing mod causes this conflict with UNP DIMONIZED Body

Fix:
v2
-fixed the \"normal map\" so that it\'s \"smoothed\" over.


v1
Simple. Modified the texture to get rid of the exposure.


Installing:
1.Extract folder into desired location.
2.Place the Texture folder in the Data folder of your Skyrim directory.


For those with the Ashen race mod, or possibly any other mod that uses custom races and 
UNP body:
  -Place the texture files in the folder of the custom race
     Ex: steamapps/skyrim/data/textures/actors/characters/Oriental/female
    -texture files are femalebody_1.dds and femalebody_1_msn.dds


Uninstall:
I recommend just re installing the DIMONIZED UNP Body from Dimon99.
You can get it here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709

Credits:
Thanks goes to Dimon99 for his awesome body mod:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709

Thanks goes to BaronDavid for his great work with the NPC clothes
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2674

Photoshop is pretty great! Thanks Photoshop!
author: dedudeguy
